snippet.title: Kids Tetris World Record
snippet.description:
$1 = how could I not buy it. Happy April everyone.

(The flicker is camtasia's fault, but I'll be damned if I'm going to play this game again to fix it. The weird sound and prolonged periods of nothing happening are 100% the game though.)
